to.info: Traded Ryan Miller, Steve Ott, conditional draft picks (2014 second round pick and 2014 third round pick) to Blues for Jaroslav Halak, Chris Stewart, William Carrier, 2015 first round pick, conditional draft picks (2014 first round pick and 2016 third round pick) on 2014-02-28
Traded Magnus Paajarvi, 2014 second round pick (#33-Ivan Barbashev), 2015 fourth round pick to Blues for David Perron, 2015 third round pick on 2013-07-10

from.info: Traded David Perron, 2015 third round pick to Oilers for Magnus Paajarvi, 2014 second round pick (#33-Ivan Barbashev), 2015 fourth round pick on 2013-07-10
Traded Matt D'Agostini, 2015 seventh round pick to Devils for 2015 conditional pick (fourth round if Devils qualify or re-sign D'Agostini, else fifth round) on 2013-03-22

to.info: Traded 2015 conditional pick (fourth round if Devils qualify or re-sign D'Agostini, else fifth round) to Blues for Matt D'Agostini, 2015 seventh round pick on 2013-03-22

Traded Ryan Miller, Steve Ott, conditional draft picks (2014 second round pick and 2014 third round pick) to Blues for Jaroslav Halak, Chris Stewart, William Carrier, 2015 first round pick, conditional draft picks (2014 first round pick and 2016 third round pick) on 2014-02-28

from.info: Traded Jordan Leopold to Blue Jackets for 2016 fifth round pick on 2014-11-15

to.info: Traded Olli Jokinen to Blues for Joakim Lindstrom, 2016 conditional round pick (fourth round if Blues advance to 2015 Stanley Cup Finals and Jokinen plays a role in it, else sixth round) on 2015-03-02

from.info: Traded Ian Cole to Penguins for Robert Bortuzzo, 2016 seventh round pick on 2015-03-02
